mapper.sql: ID, HTBH, QSRQ, FZR, YYMC, HTNR, HTNRHTNR, FKZQ, NYWFJE, NYWFSJ, XXKXM, XXKLXFS, CWKXM, CWKLXFS, YWDJR, YWDJRLXFS, SFSKWC, SKJE, HTSFDQ, HTZT, BZ, YYJB, DQSHENG, DQSHI, HTFL, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, FZRID,SSFZR,SSFZRID
mapper.insert: insert into HT (ID, HTBH, QSRQ, FZR, YYMC, HTNR, HTNRHTNR, FKZQ, NYWFJE, NYWFSJ, XXKXM, XXKLXFS, CWKXM, CWKLXFS, YWDJR, YWDJRLXFS, SFSKWC, SKJE, HTSFDQ, HTZT, BZ, YYJB, DQSHENG, DQSHI, HTFL, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, FZRID,SSFZR,SSFZRID) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{htbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{htnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{htnrhtnr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fkzq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nywfje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nywfsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xxkxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xxklxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cwkxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cwklxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ywdjr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ywdjrlxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfskwc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{htsfdq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{htzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yyjb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dqsheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dqshi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{htfl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fzrid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}),#{ssfzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssfzrid,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update HT
HTBH = #{htbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QSRQ = #{qsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FZR = #{fzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YYMC = #{yymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HTNR = #{htnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HTNRHTNR = #{htnrhtnr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FKZQ = #{fkzq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NYWFJE = #{nywfje,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NYWFSJ = #{nywfsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
XXKXM = #{xxkxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XXKLXFS = #{xxklxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CWKXM = #{cwkxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CWKLXFS = #{cwklxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YWDJR = #{ywdjr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YWDJRLXFS = #{ywdjrlxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SFSKWC = #{sfskwc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SKJE = #{skje,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HTSFDQ = #{htsfdq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HTZT = #{htzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YYJB = #{yyjb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DQSHENG = #{dqsheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DQSHI = #{dqshi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HTFL = #{htfl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FZRID = #{fzrid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SSFZR = #{ssfzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SSFZRID = #{ssfzrid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update HT set HTBH = #{htbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QSRQ = #{qsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FZR = #{fzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YYMC = #{yymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HTNR = #{htnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HTNRHTNR = #{htnrhtnr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FKZQ = #{fkzq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NYWFJE = #{nywfje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NYWFSJ = #{nywfsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, XXKXM = #{xxkxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XXKLXFS = #{xxklxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CWKXM = #{cwkxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CWKLXFS = #{cwklxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YWDJR = #{ywdjr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YWDJRLXFS = #{ywdjrlxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFSKWC = #{sfskwc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKJE = #{skje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HTSFDQ = #{htsfdq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HTZT = #{htzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YYJB = #{yyjb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DQSHENG = #{dqsheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DQSHI = #{dqshi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HTFL = #{htfl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FZRID = #{fzrid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SSFZR = #{ssfzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSFZRID = #{ssfzrid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT SUM(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 1, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS yi, SUM(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 2, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS er, SUM(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 3, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS san, SUM(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 4, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS si, SUM(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 5, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS wu, SUM(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 6, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS liu, SUM(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 7, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS qi, SUM(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 8, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS ba, SUM(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 9, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS jiu, SUM(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 10, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS shi, SUM(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 11, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS shiyi, SUM(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 12, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS shier FROM HT B where 1=1
and QSRQ >= to_date(#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and QSRQ <= to_date(#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd ')

SELECT AVG(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 1, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS yi, AVG(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 2, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS er, AVG(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 3, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS san, AVG(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 4, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS si, AVG(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 5, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS wu, AVG(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 6, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS liu, AVG(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 7, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS qi, AVG(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 8, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS ba, AVG(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 9, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS jiu, AVG(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 10, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS shi, AVG(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 11, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS shiyi, AVG(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 12, B.HTNRHTNR, 0)) AS shier FROM HT B where 1=1
and QSRQ >= to_date(#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and QSRQ <= to_date(#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd ')

SELECT COUNT(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 1, B.HTNRHTNR, NULL)) AS yi, COUNT(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 2, B.HTNRHTNR, NULL)) AS er, COUNT(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 3, B.HTNRHTNR, NULL)) AS san, COUNT(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 4, B.HTNRHTNR, NULL)) AS si, COUNT(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 5, B.HTNRHTNR, NULL)) AS wu, COUNT(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 6, B.HTNRHTNR, NULL)) AS liu, COUNT(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 7, B.HTNRHTNR, NULL)) AS qi, COUNT(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 8, B.HTNRHTNR, NULL)) AS ba, COUNT(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 9, B.HTNRHTNR, NULL)) AS jiu, COUNT(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 10, B.HTNRHTNR, NULL)) AS shi, COUNT(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 11, B.HTNRHTNR, NULL)) AS shiyi, COUNT(DECODE(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.QSRQ), 12, B.HTNRHTNR, NULL)) AS shier FROM HT B where 1=1
and QSRQ >= to_date(#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and QSRQ <= to_date(#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd ')
